review: Great product! Easy set up. Great price.
author: Maryam S.

review: Had it less than a week but so far love it! Finally able to enjoy Amazon instant with my prime membership!
author: Dana S.

review: It's everything you need! Appreciated the 30 day trial of Prime. Now I need to subscribe
author: Chris Foote

review: No mlb tv app!  As with most of the Kindle store the apps are very limited and you have to download them.  The Roku stick is much better.
author: Lee White

review: The Fire TV Stick is a wonderful alternative to satellite TV.  Love the available programs, current as well as older shows.  Would definitely recommend this to anyone.
author: Dawn Zalewski

review: It's pretty neat but it seems to be spotty when it wants to like my wireless signal.
author: Nik

review: We absolutely love our fire stick, considering getting a second!
author: Dawn Batson

review: Not my favorite stick I enjoy chromecast a lot better, the only reason I got this one is because chromecast does not support Sling TV.
author: Armando Garcia

review: i give it a 5 star for the price and with the android o/s you can download many add on apps compared to the roku which i have from other reviews from the media and such but i much prefer the fire stick now
author: 50rocks "50rocks"

review: Requires a great deal of data download speed to stream without buffering. Not mentioned at all anywhere in specifics about the fire stick.
author: ash
